page.description: Returns the number of matching records in a specified table.
page.syntax: Number_of_Records as N = DBCOUNT(C tablename,C tagname,A keyvalue)

argument.name: tablename
argument.description: The full drive, path, name, and extension of the table. If you omit the drive, path, and extension, Alpha Anywhere searches the directory of the current table.

argument.name: keyvalue
argument.description: An explicit value or the name of a field in the table containing a value.

page.discussion: DBCOUNT() searches the specified Table for one or more records with the specified Key_Value, and returns the number of records found. Note : If no records with matching key values are found, Alpha Anywhere returns a zero value.
